name: Space Dreads
description:
- Multiplayer online space combat game 1v1 and 2v2.
- GameCenter account needed.
- Internet connection required.

Welcome to Space Dreads. In Space Dreads arenas there is no room for small fighters, only gigantic hight tech machines will fight to death. Choose the smaller frigates, fast and deadly, the middle sized cruisers or the colossal dreadnaughts, and team up with a friend versus the most skilled commanders in the universe.

#simplified gameplay
#optimized network use for great 3G experience
#stunning spaceshipd and effects
